EmailTemplate.subject: Adam Smith's Friday Freeware for IT Pros | VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> IT'S... Adam Smith's Friday Giveaway!
FREE VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor Download Free: <http://bit.ly/1k8RlXb> This week, start the weekend right. Download VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor today, absolutely free <http://bit.ly/1k8RlXb>. Virtual Health Monitor is a free tool that installs on any hypervisor(s), provides real-time performance monitoring, and scales automatically as your environment grows. Gain visibility, and download .pdf efficiency and performance reports at any time. Virtual Health Monitor is freeware, and yours to keep forever. We call it "Forevereeware". Enjoy the weekend.
Adam Smith is the Father of Modern Economics. In his 1776 Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Smith pondered the omnipotent "Invisible Hand of the Market", which drives Supply and Demand to dynamic equilibrium. In 2009, we founded VMTurbo on a similar notion: the Invisible Hand of the Data Center. We haven't looked back since. Thanks, Smitty.
